name: Freestile
description:
This is an arcade/puzzle game where every move is a risk-vs-reward scenario. Move around the board and merge blocks by careful planning. Aim for as many juicy points as possible!

  • 10 challenging levels!
  • Endless game mode!
  • Interactive tutorial!
  • Many options! :)

Good luck!

Music: Fender Blender by TeraVex https://twitter.com/TeraVex?s=20
